mapper.update: update smart_rental_infos set labs_id = #{labsId,jdbcType=CHAR}, start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, approval_status = #{approvalStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, approval_user = #{approvalUser,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select id, labs_id, start_date, end_date, approval_status, approval_user from smart_rental_infos
